rows.title: About you
rows.description: We will use this to personalise the messages for sharing with your @global.share_groups.

rows.title: Your Facilitator ID
rows.description: Here you can find your unique code. You may be asked to share this code with people who will support your @global.app_name journey.

rows.title: Your Parent Groups
rows.description: See and edit the list of parents attending your groups.

rows.title: Your Content Package
